channel.title: CVE Feed for POSTAHSİL -- all

item.title: CVE-2023-7081|2024-08-02T08:50:07.807Z -- postahsi%CC%87l -- online%20payment%20system
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in POSTAHSİL Online Payment System allows SQL Injection.This issue affects Online Payment System: before 14.02.2024.
